About us

Fast cars on Demand

Welcome To CARTREK Dyno Shop At HK CARTREK. We are the place in Sofia where the BS stops and the truth in HP numbers comes to life! No matter how big or small your cars engine is we can help dyno tune and dial in your cars engine for maximum output and performance. We can provide detailed logging on your engine's performance so that we can squeeze every bit of horsepower out of your engine safely! Stop by and work with our team of professionals in the Lulin area to get you the best response from your vehicle. Effective Dyno tuning will yield better results on the track and street.
